value:
My brother and I weren't the only
ones at the orphanage. Many children
lost parents to the imperial army.

I met Prince Shannan at a temple in
the Aed desert, and...well, the rest is
history, as they say! Hehehe...

Whether it's buying bread or raising
an army, you need coin. That's why
I do what I do—whatever it takes.

I'm making lunches for folks. Huh?
How did I get the ingredients? In the
normal way, obviously!

Everyone around here is so...good.
I've got no targets to ply my trade
on! What do I do with myself?!

Got something for you. Don't worry,
I've already taken my cut. It's a gift
from $Nf! Here!
Ha! Look at me, making a killing.

I can get the job done, when I really
feel like it.
Ugh... What will Prince Shannan say?

For me? Really? Oh, thank you
so much!

I'm Patty—Prince Shannan's special
someone. Hehehe! Only joking.

There you are! I've been looking all
over for you, $Nu.$k$pHave you had a chance to eat today?
I thought not. Well, Patty's here to
save the day! I made you lunch.$k$pYou're one of the few who gets to try
my cooking. Only Prince Shannan
and Lord Seliph are as lucky as you!$k$pOh, and I got you a little something
else. Call it an extra surprise.$k$pTada! A stamina drink! My special
recipe. A swig of this and you'll have
a spring in your step all day. Enjoy!
What a fool!
Come and get it!
Don't mind me...
Something lovely for you!
Febail, help!
I'm Patty. Prince Shannan's special somebody... I'm joking!
Ugh! Unhand me, or you'll sully my good name!
You can't wage war without a treasury. I'll fill it up for you!
Let people say whatever they want. I pay it no mind.
The empire orphaned all these children. Unforgivable!
I've always admired Prince Shannan. I await our fateful encounter... *chuckle*
I whipped up this stamina drink for you. Don't waste a single drop!
Got it.
Hmmm.
I'm off!
